content: Because of the level of pollution, which was mentioned before, you can help the local environment by avoiding petrol-based means of transport, so you can both spend less money and reduce the level of pollution.
translations: ita:A causa del livello di inquinamento che è stato detto in precedenza, è possibile aiutare l'ambiente locale evitando mezz
